title: New: Hot Sugar – MiDi Murder EP
content:
NYC producer Nick Koenig aka Hot Sugar has been dropping instrumentals that have increasingly been garnering support and praise for the young producer. It was his collaborative effort with NYC via Barbados MC Haleek Maul however, that finally brought his music to a wider audience. Sure, his cuts still remain very much within the blog world, but regardless, more people are listening. In terms of collaboration his new Ep, MiDi Murder EP, is his most ambitious. Featuring Haleek Maul, Antwon, Fat Tony, Big Baby Ghandi, Heems, KOOL AD and Shady Blaze, it’s a clusterfuck of wackball MCs and the result is pretty damn exciting.

Stream and D/L the EP below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
